items.Name: Bright Powder
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It casts a tricky glare that lowers the opposing Pokémon's accuracy.

items.Name: White Herb
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It will restore any lowered stat in battle. It can be used only once.

items.Name: Macho Brace
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This stiff, heavy brace helps Pokemon grow strong but cuts Speed in battle.

items.Name: Exp. Share
items.Description: Turning on this special device will allow all the Pokémon on your team to receive Exp. Points from battles.

items.Name: Quick Claw
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This light, sharp claw lets the bearer move first occasionally.

items.Name: Soothe Bell
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The comforting chime of this bell calms the holder, making it friendly.

items.Name: Mental Herb
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder shakes off move-binding effects to move freely. It can be used only once.

items.Name: Choice Band
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This curious headband boosts Attack but only allows the use of one move.

items.Name: King's Rock
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.

items.Name: Silver Powder
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a shiny, silver powder that will boost the power of Bug-type moves.

items.Name: Amulet Coin
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles any prize money received if the holding Pokémon joins a battle.

items.Name: Cleanse Tag
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the holder is the head of the party.

items.Name: Soul Dew
items.Description: A wondrous orb to be held by either Latios or Latias. It raises the power of Psychic- and Dragon-type moves.

items.Name: Deep Sea Tooth
items.Description: An item to be held by Clamperl. This fang gleams a sharp silver and raises the holder's Sp. Atk stat.

items.Name: Deep Sea Scale
items.Description: An item to be held by Clamperl. This scale shines with a faint pink and raises the holder's Sp. Def stat.

items.Name: Smoke Ball
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to flee from any wild Pokémon encounter without fail.

items.Name: Everstone
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A Pokémon holding this peculiar stone is prevented from evolving.

items.Name: Focus Band
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder may endure a potential KO attack, leaving it with just 1 HP.

items.Name: Lucky Egg
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's an egg filled with happiness that earns extra Exp. Points in battle.

items.Name: Scope Lens
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a lens for scoping out weak points. It boosts the holder's critical-hit ratio.

items.Name: Metal Coat
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a special metallic film that can boost the power of Steel-type moves.

items.Name: Leftovers
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder's HP is slowly but steadily restored throughout every battle.

items.Name: Dragon Scale
items.Description: A very tough and inflexible scale. Dragon-type Pokémon may be holding this item when caught.

items.Name: Light Ball
items.Description: An item to be held by Pikachu. It's a puzzling orb that boosts its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

items.Name: Soft Sand
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a loose, silky sand that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.

items.Name: Hard Stone
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a durable stone that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

items.Name: Miracle Seed
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a seed imbued with life force that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

items.Name: Black Glasses
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A pair of shady-looking glasses that boost the power of Dark-type moves.

items.Name: Black Belt
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This belt helps the wearer to focus and boosts the power of Fighting-type moves.

items.Name: Magnet
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a powerful magnet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.

items.Name: Mystic Water
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This teardrop-shaped gem boosts the power of Water-type moves.

items.Name: Sharp Beak
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a long, sharp beak that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.

items.Name: Poison Barb
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This small, poisonous barb boosts the power of Poison-type moves.

items.Name: Never-Melt Ice
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a piece of ice that repels heat effects and boosts Ice-type moves.

items.Name: Spell Tag
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a sinister, eerie tag that boosts the power of Ghost-type moves.

items.Name: Twisted Spoon
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This spoon is imbued with telekinetic power and boosts Psychic-type moves.

items.Name: Charcoal
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

items.Name: Dragon Fang
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This hard and sharp fang boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.

items.Name: Silk Scarf
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a sumptuous scarf that boosts the power of Normal-type moves.

items.Name: Up-Grade
items.Description: A transparent device somehow filled with all sorts of data. It was produced by Silph Co.

items.Name: Shell Bell
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder regains a little HP every time it inflicts damage on others.

items.Name: Sea Incense
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This incense has a curious aroma that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

items.Name: Lax Incense
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The beguiling aroma of this incense may cause attacks to miss its holder.

items.Name: Lucky Punch
items.Description: An item to be held by Chansey. This pair of lucky boxing gloves will boost Chansey's critical-hit ratio.

items.Name: Metal Powder
items.Description: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Defense stat.

items.Name: Thick Club
items.Description: An item to be held by Cubone or Marowak. It's a hard bone of some sort that boosts the Attack stat.

items.Name: Stick
items.Description: An item to be held by Farfetch'd. This very long and stiff stalk of leek boosts its critical-hit ratio.

items.Name: Red Scarf
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. During a contest, it raises the Cool aspect of the Pokémon holding it.

items.Name: Blue Scarf
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. During a contest, it raises the Beauty aspect of the Pokémon holding it.

items.Name: Pink Scarf
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. During a contest, it raises the Cute aspect of the Pokémon holding it.

items.Name: Green Scarf
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. During a contest, it raises the Clever aspect of the Pokémon holding it.

items.Name: Yellow Scarf
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. During a contest, it raises the Tough aspect of the Pokémon holding it.

items.Name: Wide Lens
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.

items.Name: Muscle Band
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This headband exudes strength, slightly boosting the power of physical moves.

items.Name: Wise Glasses
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This thick pair of glasses slightly boosts the power of special moves.

items.Name: Expert Belt
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a well-worn belt that slightly boosts the power of super effective moves.

items.Name: Light Clay
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Protective moves like Light Screen and Reflect will be effective longer.

items.Name: Life Orb
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the power of moves, but at the cost of some HP on each hit.

items.Name: Power Herb
items.Description: A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It allows the holder to immediately use a move that normally requires a turn to charge.

items.Name: Toxic Orb
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a bizarre orb that will badly poison the holder during battle.

items.Name: Flame Orb
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a bizarre orb that will afflict the holder with a burn during battle.

items.Name: Quick Powder
items.Description: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.

items.Name: Focus Sash
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder has full HP, it will endure a potential KO attack with 1 HP. The item then disappears.

items.Name: Zoom Lens
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder moves after its target moves, its accuracy will be boosted.

items.Name: Metronome
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts moves used consecutively, but only until a different move is used.

items.Name: Iron Ball
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It lowers Speed and allows Ground-type moves to hit Flying-type and levitating holders.

items.Name: Lagging Tail
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is tremendously heavy and makes the holder move slower than usual.

items.Name: Destiny Knot
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the opposing Pokémon will be, too.

items.Name: Black Sludge
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It gradually restores HP to Poison-type Pokémon. It damages any other type.

items.Name: Icy Rock
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Hail when used by the holder.

items.Name: Smooth Rock
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Sandstorm when used by the holder.

items.Name: Heat Rock
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Sunny Day when used by the holder.

items.Name: Damp Rock
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Rain Dance when used by the holder.

items.Name: Grip Claw
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of multi-turn attacks like Bind and Wrap.

items.Name: Choice Scarf
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This curious scarf boosts Speed but only allows the use of one move.

items.Name: Sticky Barb
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It damages the holder every turn and may latch onto Pokémon that touch the holder.

items.Name: Power Bracer
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Attack stat to grow more after battling.

items.Name: Power Belt
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Defense stat to grow more after battling.

items.Name: Power Lens
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Sp. Atk stat to grow more after battling.

items.Name: Power Band
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Sp. Def stat to grow more after battling.

items.Name: Power Anklet
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Speed stat to grow more after battling.

items.Name: Power Weight
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's maximum HP to grow more after battling.

items.Name: Shed Shell
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This discarded carapace enables the holder to switch out of battle without fail.

items.Name: Big Root
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the power of HP-stealing moves so the holder recovers more HP.

items.Name: Choice Specs
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These curious glasses boost Sp. Atk but only allow the use of one move.

items.Name: Flame Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

items.Name: Splash Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

items.Name: Zap Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.

items.Name: Meadow Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

items.Name: Icicle Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ice-type moves.

items.Name: Fist Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fighting-type moves.

items.Name: Toxic Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Poison-type moves.

items.Name: Earth Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.

items.Name: Sky Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.

items.Name: Mind Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.

items.Name: Insect Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Bug-type moves.

items.Name: Stone Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

items.Name: Spooky Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ghost-type moves.

items.Name: Draco Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.

items.Name: Dread Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dark-type moves.

items.Name: Iron Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Steel-type moves.

items.Name: Odd Incense
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.

items.Name: Rock Incense
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

items.Name: Full Incense
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense makes the holder bloated and slow moving.

items.Name: Wave Incense
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This incense has a curious aroma that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

items.Name: Rose Incense
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

items.Name: Luck Incense
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles any prize money received if the holding Pokémon joins a battle.

items.Name: Pure Incense
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the holder is the head of the party.

items.Name: Protector
items.Description: A protective item of some sort. It is extremely stiff and heavy. It's loved by a certain Pokémon.

items.Name: Electirizer
items.Description: A box packed with a tremendous amount of electric energy. It's loved by a certain Pokémon.

items.Name: Magmarizer
items.Description: A box packed with a tremendous amount of magma energy. It's loved by a certain Pokémon.

items.Name: Dubious Disc
items.Description: A transparent device overflowing with dubious data. Its producer is unknown.

items.Name: Reaper Cloth
items.Description: A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It's loved by a certain Pokémon.

items.Name: Razor Claw
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This sharply hooked claw increases the holder's critical-hit ratio.

items.Name: Razor Fang
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.

items.Name: TM01
items.Description: Teaches Hone Claws to a compatible Pokémon. The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

items.Name: TM02
items.Description: Teaches Dragon Claw to a compatible Pokémon. The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.

items.Name: TM03
items.Description: Teaches Psyshock to a compatible Pokémon. The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

items.Name: TM04
items.Description: Teaches Calm Mind to a compatible Pokémon. The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

items.Name: TM05
items.Description: Teaches Roar to a compatible Pokémon. The target is scared off and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

items.Name: TM06
items.Description: Teaches Toxic to a compatible Pokémon. A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

items.Name: TM07
items.Description: Teaches Hail to a compatible Pokémon. The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

items.Name: TM08
items.Description: Teaches Bulk Up to a compatible Pokémon. The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

items.Name: TM09
items.Description: Teaches Venoshock to a compatible Pokémon. The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

items.Name: TM10
items.Description: Teaches Hidden Power to a compatible Pokémon. A unique attack that varies in type depending on the Pokémon using it.

items.Name: TM11
items.Description: Teaches Sunny Day to a compatible Pokémon. The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

items.Name: TM12
items.Description: Teaches Taunt to a compatible Pokémon. The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

items.Name: TM13
items.Description: Teaches Ice Beam to a compatible Pokémon. The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

items.Name: TM14
items.Description: Teaches Blizzard to a compatible Pokémon. A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

items.Name: TM15
items.Description: Teaches Hyper Beam to a compatible Pokémon. The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

items.Name: TM16
items.Description: Teaches Light Screen to a compatible Pokémon. A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.

items.Name: TM17
items.Description: Teaches Protect to a compatible Pokémon. Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

items.Name: TM18
items.Description: Teaches Rain Dance to a compatible Pokémon. The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.

items.Name: TM19
items.Description: Teaches Roost to a compatible Pokémon. The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

items.Name: TM20
items.Description: Teaches Safeguard to a compatible Pokémon. The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

items.Name: TM21
items.Description: Teaches Frustration to a compatible Pokémon. A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

items.Name: TM22
items.Description: Teaches Solar Beam to a compatible Pokémon. A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

items.Name: TM23
items.Description: Teaches Smack Down to a compatible Pokémon. The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it's hit.

items.Name: TM24
items.Description: Teaches Thunderbolt to a compatible Pokémon. A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

items.Name: TM25
items.Description: Teaches Thunder to a compatible Pokémon. A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

items.Name: TM26
items.Description: Teaches Earthquake to a compatible Pokémon. The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

items.Name: TM27
items.Description: Teaches Return to a compatible Pokémon. A full-power attack that grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

items.Name: TM28
items.Description: Teaches Dig to a compatible Pokémon. The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

items.Name: TM29
items.Description: Teaches Psychic to a compatible Pokémon. The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

items.Name: TM30
items.Description: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon. The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

items.Name: TM31
items.Description: Teaches Brick Break to a compatible Pokémon. The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

items.Name: TM32
items.Description: Teaches Double Team to a compatible Pokémon. By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

items.Name: TM33
items.Description: Teaches Reflect to a compatible Pokémon. A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.

items.Name: TM34
items.Description: Teaches Sludge Wave to a compatible Pokémon. The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit.

items.Name: TM35
items.Description: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon. The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

items.Name: TM36
items.Description: Teaches Sludge Bomb to a compatible Pokémon. Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

items.Name: TM37
items.Description: Teaches Sandstorm to a compatible Pokémon. A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

items.Name: TM38
items.Description: Teaches Fire Blast to a compatible Pokémon. The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

items.Name: TM39
items.Description: Teaches Rock Tomb to a compatible Pokémon. Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by preventing its movement.

items.Name: TM40
items.Description: Teaches Aerial Ace to a compatible Pokémon. The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

items.Name: TM41
items.Description: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon. The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

items.Name: TM42
items.Description: Teaches Facade to a compatible Pokémon. An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or has paralysis.

items.Name: TM43
items.Description: Teaches Flame Charge to a compatible Pokémon. Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.

items.Name: TM44
items.Description: Teaches Rest to a compatible Pokémon. The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and heals any status conditions.

items.Name: TM45
items.Description: Teaches Attract to a compatible Pokémon. If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

items.Name: TM46
items.Description: Teaches Thief to a compatible Pokémon. The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. The user can't steal anything if it already holds an item.

items.Name: TM47
items.Description: Teaches Low Sweep to a compatible Pokémon. The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.

items.Name: TM48
items.Description: Teaches Round to a compatible Pokémon. The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

items.Name: TM49
items.Description: Teaches Echoed Voice to a compatible Pokémon. The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage.

items.Name: TM50
items.Description: Teaches Overheat to a compatible Pokémon. The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

items.Name: TM51
items.Description: Teaches Steel Wing to a compatible Pokémon. The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user's Defense stat.

items.Name: TM52
items.Description: Teaches Focus Blast to a compatible Pokémon. The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

items.Name: TM53
items.Description: Teaches Energy Ball to a compatible Pokémon. The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

items.Name: TM54
items.Description: Teaches False Swipe to a compatible Pokémon. A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

items.Name: TM55
items.Description: Teaches Scald to a compatible Pokémon. The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

items.Name: TM56
items.Description: Teaches Fling to a compatible Pokémon. The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move's power and effects depend on the item.

items.Name: TM57
items.Description: Teaches Charge Beam to a compatible Pokémon. The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

items.Name: TM58
items.Description: Teaches Sky Drop to a compatible Pokémon. The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

items.Name: TM59
items.Description: Teaches Incinerate to a compatible Pokémon. The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

items.Name: TM60
items.Description: Teaches Quash to a compatible Pokémon. The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

items.Name: TM61
items.Description: Teaches Will-O-Wisp to a compatible Pokémon. The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

items.Name: TM62
items.Description: Teaches Acrobatics to a compatible Pokémon. The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

items.Name: TM63
items.Description: Teaches Embargo to a compatible Pokémon. This move prevents the target from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

items.Name: TM64
items.Description: Teaches Explosion to a compatible Pokémon. The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

items.Name: TM65
items.Description: Teaches Shadow Claw to a compatible Pokémon. The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

items.Name: TM66
items.Description: Teaches Payback to a compatible Pokémon. The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

items.Name: TM67
items.Description: Teaches Retaliate to a compatible Pokémon. The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move becomes more powerful.

items.Name: TM68
items.Description: Teaches Giga Impact to a compatible Pokémon. The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

items.Name: TM69
items.Description: Teaches Rock Polish to a compatible Pokémon. The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This can sharply raise the Speed stat.

items.Name: TM70
items.Description: Teaches Flash to a compatible Pokémon. The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy.

items.Name: TM71
items.Description: Teaches Stone Edge to a compatible Pokémon. The user stabs the target with sharpened stones from below. Critical hits land more easily.

items.Name: TM72
items.Description: Teaches Volt Switch to a compatible Pokémon. After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

items.Name: TM73
items.Description: Teaches Thunder Wave to a compatible Pokémon. The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

items.Name: TM74
items.Description: Teaches Gyro Ball to a compatible Pokémon. The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move's power.

items.Name: TM75
items.Description: Teaches Swords Dance to a compatible Pokémon. A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

items.Name: TM76
items.Description: Teaches Struggle Bug to a compatible Pokémon. While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.

items.Name: TM77
items.Description: Teaches Psych Up to a compatible Pokémon. The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

items.Name: TM78
items.Description: Teaches Bulldoze to a compatible Pokémon. The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.

items.Name: TM79
items.Description: Teaches Frost Breath to a compatible Pokémon. The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

items.Name: TM80
items.Description: Teaches Rock Slide to a compatible Pokémon. Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

items.Name: TM81
items.Description: Teaches X-Scissor to a compatible Pokémon. The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

items.Name: TM82
items.Description: Teaches Dragon Tail to a compatible Pokémon. The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

items.Name: TM83
items.Description: Teaches Infestation to a compatible Pokémon. The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can't flee during this time.

items.Name: TM84
items.Description: Teaches Poison Jab to a compatible Pokémon. The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

items.Name: TM85
items.Description: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon. The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.

items.Name: TM86
items.Description: Teaches Grass Knot to a compatible Pokémon. The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

items.Name: TM87
items.Description: Teaches Swagger to a compatible Pokémon. The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

items.Name: TM88
items.Description: Teaches Sleep Talk to a compatible Pokémon. While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

items.Name: TM89
items.Description: Teaches U-turn to a compatible Pokémon. After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

items.Name: TM90
items.Description: Teaches Substitute to a compatible Pokémon. The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.

items.Name: TM91
items.Description: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon. The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

items.Name: TM92
items.Description: Teaches Trick Room to a compatible Pokémon. The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

items.Name: HM01
items.Description: Teaches Cut to a compatible Pokémon. The target is cut with a scythe or claw. This can also be used to cut down thin trees.

items.Name: HM02
items.Description: Teaches Fly to a compatible Pokémon. The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn. This can also be used to fly to any familiar town.

items.Name: HM03
items.Description: Teaches Surf to a compatible Pokémon. The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave. This can also be used for crossing water.

items.Name: HM04
items.Description: Teaches Strength to a compatible Pokémon. The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. This can also be used to move heavy boulders.

items.Name: HM05
items.Description: Teaches Waterfall to a compatible Pokémon. The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.

items.Name: HM06
items.Description: Teaches Rock Smash to a compatible Pokémon. The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat. This move can also shatter rocks in the field.

items.Name: Explorer Kit
items.Description: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground in the Sinnoh region.

items.Name: Loot Sack
items.Description: A sturdy, spacious bag that is used to carry any treasures or loot obtained in the coal mine.

items.Name: Rule Book
items.Description: It lists the rules for holding battles. For Link Battles, you may choose which set of rules you wish to use.

items.Name: Poké Radar
items.Description: A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding in grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk.

items.Name: Point Card
items.Description: A card that lists the Battle Points you have earned.

items.Name: Journal
items.Description: A notebook that keeps a day-to-day record of your adventure so far.

items.Name: Seal Case
items.Description: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the Capsule cases of Poké Balls.

items.Name: Fashion Case
items.Description: A lovely case to store colorful Props for your Pokémon to wear in a musical.

items.Name: Seal Bag
items.Description: A tiny bag that can hold 10 Seals for decorating Poké Balls.

items.Name: Pal Pad
items.Description: A convenient notepad that is used for registering your friends, Friend Codes, and keeping a record of game play.

items.Name: Works Key
items.Description: A large key for operating the doors of the Valley Windworks in the canyon. It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.

items.Name: Old Charm
items.Description: An ancient good-luck charm made of Pokémon bones to be taken to the elder of Celestic Town.

items.Name: Galactic Key
items.Description: A card key for disengaging security systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it can result in punishment, apparently.

items.Name: Red Chain
items.Description: A mythical chain that is said to link the Legendary Pokémon that created the Sinnoh region.

items.Name: Town Map
items.Description: A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime. It even shows you your present location in the region.

items.Name: Vs. Seeker
items.Description: A device that indicates Trainers who want to battle. Its battery charges while you walk.

items.Name: Coin Case
items.Description: A case for holding coins obtained at the Game Corner. It holds up to 9,999 coins.

items.Name: Old Rod
items.Description: An old and beat-up fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

items.Name: Good Rod
items.Description: A new, good-quality fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

items.Name: Super Rod
items.Description: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

items.Name: Sprayduck
items.Description: A watering can shaped like a Psyduck. It helps promote the healthy growth of any Berries planted in good, soft soil.

items.Name: Poffin Case
items.Description: A case for storing Poffin cooked from Berries.

items.Name: Bicycle
items.Description: A folding Bike that enables a rider to get around much faster.

items.Name: Suite Key
items.Description: A key to one of the suites at the luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd reason, it often disappears.

items.Name: Oak's Letter
items.Description: A letter from Professor Oak. Written in it is a request for you to go to Route 224.

items.Name: Lunar Wing
items.Description: A feather that glows like the moon. It's said to possess the power to dispel nightmares.

items.Name: Member Card
items.Description: A card needed for entering the inn in Canalave City. Oddly, the last date marked on it was 50 years ago.

items.Name: Azure Flute
items.Description: A flute that puts out echoing sounds that do not seem to be of this world. No one knows who made it.

items.Name: S.S. Ticket
items.Description: The ticket required for sailing on a ferry.

items.Name: Contest Pass
items.Description: A pass required for entering Pokémon Contests. It has a drawing of an award ribbon on its front.

items.Name: Magma Stone
items.Description: A stone formed by boulders melting in intensely hot magma, then hardening. Magma remains sealed inside it.

items.Name: Parcel
items.Description: A parcel entrusted in your care. You are supposed to deliver it to your childhood friend who left Twinleaf Town.

items.Name: Coupon 1
items.Description: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.

items.Name: Coupon 2
items.Description: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.

items.Name: Coupon 3
items.Description: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.

items.Name: Storage Key
items.Description: The key to Team Galactic's sinister warehouse located at the edge of Veilstone City.

items.Name: Secret Potion
items.Description: A fantastic medicine dispensed by the pharmacy in Cianwood City. It fully heals a Pokémon of any ailment.

items.Name: Vs. Recorder
items.Description: An amazing device that can record a battle between friends or the battles at certain special battle facilities.

items.Name: Gracidea
items.Description: A flower sometimes bundled in bouquets to convey gratitude on special occasions like birthdays.

items.Name: Secret Key
items.Description: A high-tech key that has to be used at a specific location. It emits a special electronic signal to open a door.

items.Name: Apricorn Box
items.Description: A handy box where you can store up to 99 Apricorns of each kind.

items.Name: Unown Report
items.Description: A report of all the discovered kinds of Unown.

items.Name: Berry Pots
items.Description: Handy containers for cultivating Berries wherever you go.

items.Name: Dowsing Machine
items.Description: This high-tech machine shows the location of invisible items. It's attached to the head when in use.

items.Name: Blue Card
items.Description: A card to save points for the Buena's Password show.

items.Name: Slowpoke Tail
items.Description: A very tasty tail of something. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

items.Name: Clear Bell
items.Description: A very old-fashioned bell that makes a gentle ringing sound.

items.Name: Card Key
items.Description: A card key that opens a shutter in the Radio Tower.

items.Name: Basement Key
items.Description: A key that opens a door in the Goldenrod Tunnel.

items.Name: Squirt Bottle
items.Description: A bottle used for watering plants in the Berry Pots.

items.Name: Red Scale
items.Description: A scale from the red Gyarados. It glows red like a flame.

items.Name: Lost Item
items.Description: The Mime Jr. doll that was lost by the Copycat.

items.Name: Pass
items.Description: A ticket required for riding the Magnet Train. It allows you to ride whenever and however much you'd like.

items.Name: Machine Part
items.Description: An important machine part for the Power Plant that was stolen.

items.Name: Silver Wing
items.Description: A strange, silvery feather that sparkles.

items.Name: Rainbow Wing
items.Description: A mystical rainbow feather that sparkles.

items.Name: Mystery Egg
items.Description: A mysterious Egg obtained from Mr. Pokémon. What's in the Egg is unknown.

items.Name: Red Apricorn
items.Description: A red Apricorn. It assails your nostrils.

items.Name: Blue Apricorn
items.Description: A blue Apricorn. It smells a bit like grass.

items.Name: Yellow Apricorn
items.Description: A yellow Apricorn. It has an invigorating scent.

items.Name: Green Apricorn
items.Description: A green Apricorn. It has a mysterious, aromatic scent.

items.Name: Pink Apricorn
items.Description: A pink Apricorn. It has a nice, sweet scent.

items.Name: White Apricorn
items.Description: A white Apricorn. It doesn't smell like anything.

items.Name: Black Apricorn
items.Description: A black Apricorn. It has a scent beyond one's experience.

items.Name: Fast Ball
items.Description: A Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokémon that are usually very quick to run away.

items.Name: Level Ball
items.Description: A Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokémon that are at a lower level than your own Pokémon.

items.Name: Lure Ball
items.Description: A Poké Ball that is good for catching Pokémon that you reel in with a Rod while out fishing.

items.Name: Heavy Ball
items.Description: A Poké Ball that is better than usual at catching very heavy Pokémon.

items.Name: Love Ball
items.Description: A Poké Ball that works best when catching a Pokémon that is of the opposite gender of your Pokémon.

items.Name: Friend Ball
items.Description: A strange Poké Ball that will make the wild Pokémon caught with it more friendly toward you immediately.

items.Name: Moon Ball
items.Description: A Poké Ball that will make it easier to catch Pokémon that can evolve using a Moon Stone.

items.Name: Sport Ball
items.Description: A special Poké Ball that is used during the Bug-Catching Contest.

items.Name: Park Ball
items.Description: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.

items.Name: Photo Album
items.Description: A nice photo album for storing all the photos taken along your adventure.

items.Name: GB Sounds
items.Description: A music player that allows you to listen to nostalgic songs. It's operated with the flip of a single switch.

items.Name: Tidal Bell
items.Description: A very old-fashioned bell that makes a gentle ringing sound.

items.Name: Rage Candy Bar
items.Description: Mahogany Town's famous candy. When consumed, it restores 20 HP to an injured Pokémon.

items.Name: Data Card 01
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many victories you've had.

items.Name: Data Card 02
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many losses you've had.

items.Name: Data Card 03
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have dashed.

items.Name: Data Card 04
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have jumped.

items.Name: Data Card 05
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won the Hurdle Dash.

items.Name: Data Card 06
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won the Relay Run.

items.Name: Data Card 07
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Pennant Capture.

items.Name: Data Card 08
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Block Smash.

items.Name: Data Card 09
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Disc Catch.

items.Name: Data Card 10
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Snow Throw.

items.Name: Data Card 11
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many points your Pokémon scored.

items.Name: Data Card 12
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have failed.

items.Name: Data Card 13
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon impeded themselves.

items.Name: Data Card 14
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have tackled.

items.Name: Data Card 15
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have fallen down.

items.Name: Data Card 16
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Ring Drop.

items.Name: Data Card 17
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Lamp Jump.

items.Name: Data Card 18
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Circle Push.

items.Name: Data Card 19
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many Link Pokéathlon wins you've had.

items.Name: Data Card 20
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many Link Pokéathlon losses you've had.

items.Name: Data Card 21
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won an event.

items.Name: Data Card 22
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've lost an event.

items.Name: Data Card 23
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've switched Pokémon.

items.Name: Data Card 24
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've won Goal Roll.

items.Name: Data Card 25
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times your Pokémon won individual prizes.

items.Name: Data Card 26
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how many times you've instructed your Pokémon.

items.Name: Data Card 27
items.Description: It holds Pokéathlon records. It's a card that shows how much time you've spent in the Pokéathlon.

items.Name: Jade Orb
items.Description: A shiny green orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.

items.Name: Lock Capsule
items.Description: A sturdy Capsule that can only be opened with a special key.

items.Name: Red Orb
items.Description: A shiny red orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.

items.Name: Blue Orb
items.Description: A shiny blue orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.

items.Name: Enigma Stone
items.Description: A crystal ball that was excavated from the ground. It's a very beautiful stone that is covered with bits of rock and earth.

items.Name: Prism Scale
items.Description: A mysterious scale that causes a certain Pokémon to evolve. It shines in rainbow colors.

items.Name: Eviolite
items.Description: A mysterious Evolutionary lump. When held by a Pokémon that can still evolve, it raises both Defense and Sp. Def.

items.Name: Float Stone
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This very light stone reduces the weight of a Pokémon when held.

items.Name: Rocky Helmet
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.

items.Name: Air Balloon
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder will float in the air until hit. Once hit, this item will burst.

items.Name: Red Card
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder is hit by an attack, the attacker is removed from battle.

items.Name: Ring Target
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Moves that normally have no effect will land on a Pokémon holding it.

items.Name: Binding Band
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A band that increases the power of binding moves used by the holder.

items.Name: Absorb Bulb
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Atk if hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.

items.Name: Cell Battery
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Attack if hit with an Electric-type attack. It can only be used once.

items.Name: Eject Button
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit by an attack, it will be switched out of battle.

items.Name: Fire Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of fire. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fire-type move one time.

items.Name: Water Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of water. When held, it strengthens the power of a Water-type move one time.

items.Name: Electric Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of electricity. When held, it strengthens the power of an Electric-type move one time.

items.Name: Grass Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of nature. When held, it strengthens the power of a Grass-type move one time.

items.Name: Ice Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of ice. When held, it strengthens the power of an Ice-type move one time.

items.Name: Fighting Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of combat. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fighting-type move one time.

items.Name: Poison Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of poison. When held, it strengthens the power of a Poison-type move one time.

items.Name: Ground Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of land. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ground-type move one time.

items.Name: Flying Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of air. When held, it strengthens the power of a Flying-type move one time.

items.Name: Psychic Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of the mind. When held, it strengthens the power of a Psychic-type move one time.

items.Name: Bug Gem
items.Description: A gem with an insect-like essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Bug-type move one time.

items.Name: Rock Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of rock. When held, it strengthens the power of a Rock-type move one time.

items.Name: Ghost Gem
items.Description: A gem with a spectral essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ghost-type move one time.

items.Name: Dragon Gem
items.Description: A gem with a draconic essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Dragon-type move one time.

items.Name: Dark Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of darkness. When held, it strengthens the power of a Dark-type move one time.

items.Name: Steel Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of steel. When held, it strengthens the power of a Steel-type move one time.

items.Name: Normal Gem
items.Description: A gem with an ordinary essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Normal-type move one time.

items.Name: Health Wing
items.Description: An item for use on a Pokemon. It slightly increases the base HP of a single Pokemon.

items.Name: Muscle Wing
items.Description: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Attack stat of a single Pokémon.

items.Name: Resist Wing
items.Description: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Defense stat of a single Pokémon.

items.Name: Genius Wing
items.Description: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Sp. Atk stat of a single Pokémon.

items.Name: Clever Wing
items.Description: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Sp. Def stat of a single Pokémon.

items.Name: Swift Wing
items.Description: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Speed stat of a single Pokémon.

items.Name: Pretty Wing
items.Description: Though this feather is beautiful, it's just a regular feather and has no effect on Pokémon.

items.Name: Cover Fossil
items.Description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived in the sea. It appears as though it could be part of its back.

items.Name: Plume Fossil
items.Description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks to be some kind of protective collar.

items.Name: Liberty Pass
items.Description: A special pass to go to Liberty Garden. Board the ship in Castelia City.

items.Name: Pass Orb
items.Description: A mysterious orb containing the power of the Unova region, to be used when generating Pass Power.

items.Name: Dream Ball
items.Description: A special Poké Ball that appears in your Bag out of nowhere in the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokémon.

items.Name: Poké Toy
items.Description: A toy that attracts the attention of a Pokémon. It guarantees escape from any battle with wild Pokémon.

items.Name: Prop Case
items.Description: A lovely case to store colorful Props for your Pokémon to wear in a musical.

items.Name: Dragon Skull
items.Description: A skull of a Pokémon which was said to have braved the angry waters to fly around the world.

items.Name: Balm Mushroom
items.Description: A rare mushroom that gives off a nice fragrance. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

items.Name: Big Nugget
items.Description: A big nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

items.Name: Pearl String
items.Description: Very large pearls that sparkle in a pretty silver color. They can be sold at a high price to shops.

items.Name: Comet Shard
items.Description: A shard that fell to the ground when a comet approached. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

items.Name: Relic Copper
items.Description: A copper coin used by an ancient civilization about 3,000 years ago.

items.Name: Relic Silver
items.Description: A gold coin used by an ancient civilization about 3,000 years ago.

items.Name: Relic Gold
items.Description: A gold coin used by an ancient civilization about 3,000 years ago.

items.Name: Relic Vase
items.Description: A fragile vase made by an ancient civilization about 3,000 years ago.

items.Name: Relic Band
items.Description: A heavy bracelet made by an ancient civilization about 3,000 years ago.

items.Name: Relic Statue
items.Description: A stone figurine made by an ancient civilization about 3,000 years ago.

items.Name: Relic Crown
items.Description: A heavy crown made by an ancient civilization about 3,000 years ago.

items.Name: Casteliacone
items.Description: Castelia City's specialty, soft-serve ice cream. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.

items.Name: Dire Hit 2
items.Description: It can be used many times to raise the critical-hit ratio of one Pokémon. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Speed 2
items.Description: It sharply raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Sp. Atk 2
items.Description: It sharply raises the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Sp. Def 2
items.Description: It sharply raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Defense 2
items.Description: It sharply raises the Defense stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Accuracy 2
items.Description: It sharply raises the Attack stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Speed 3
items.Description: It drastically raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Sp. Atk 3
items.Description: It drastically raises the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Sp. Def 3
items.Description: It sharply raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Defense 3
items.Description: It drastically raises the Defense stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Attack 3
items.Description: It drastically raises the Attack stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Accuracy 3
items.Description: It drastically raises the accuracy of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Speed 6
items.Description: It raises the Speed stat of a Pokémon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Sp. Atk 6
items.Description: It raises the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokémon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Sp. Def 6
items.Description: It raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Defense 6
items.Description: It raises the Defense stat of a Pokémon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Attack 6
items.Description: It raises the Attack stat of a Pokémon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: X Accuracy 6
items.Description: It raises the accuracy of a Pokémon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: Ability Urge
items.Description: When used, it activates the Ability of an ally Pokémon.

items.Name: Item Drop
items.Description: When used, it activates the Ability of an ally Pokémon.

items.Name: Item Urge
items.Description: When used, it causes an ally Pokémon to use its held item.

items.Name: Reset Urge
items.Description: When used, it restores any stat changes of an ally Pokémon.

items.Name: Dire Hit 3
items.Description: It can be used many times to greatly raise a Pokémon's critical-hit ratio. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.Name: Light Stone
items.Description: Reshiram's body was destroyed and changed into this stone. It is said to be waiting for the emergence of a hero.

items.Name: Dark Stone
items.Description: Zekrom's body was destroyed and changed into this stone. It is said to be waiting for the emergence of a hero.

items.Name: TM93
items.Description: Teaches Wild Charge to a compatible Pokémon. The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.

items.Name: TM94
items.Description: Teaches Secret Power to a compatible Pokémon. The additional effects of this attack depend upon where it was used.

items.Name: TM95
items.Description: Teaches Snarl to a compatible Pokémon. The user yells as if it's ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.

items.Name: Xtransceiver
items.Description: A high-tech transceiver with a camera function. It allows up to four-way calls.

items.Name: Gram 1
items.Description: An important letter which Wingull delivers.

items.Name: Gram 2
items.Description: An important letter which Wingull delivers.

items.Name: Gram 3
items.Description: An important letter which Wingull delivers.

items.Name: Xtransceiver
items.Description: A high-tech transceiver with a camera function. It allows up to four-way calls.

items.Name: Medal Box
items.Description: A box-shaped machine that stores Medals and Medal information.

items.Name: DNA Splicers
items.Description: A splicer that separates Kyurem and a certain Pokémon when they are fused.

items.Name: DNA Splicers
items.Description: A splicer that separates Kyurem and a certain Pokémon when they are fused.

items.Name: Permit
items.Description: A permit needed to enter the Nature Preserve. Only a few know about this place.

items.Name: Oval Charm
items.Description: An oval charm said to increase the chance of Pokémon Eggs being found at the Day Care.

items.Name: Shiny Charm
items.Description: A shiny charm said to increase the chance of finding a Shiny Pokémon in the wild.

items.Name: Plasma Card
items.Description: A card key needed to enter the password inside the Plasma Frigate.

items.Name: Grubby Hanky
items.Description: A handkerchief dropped by a regular at the Café Warehouse. It smells faintly like a Pokémon.

items.Name: Colress Machine
items.Description: A special device that wrings out the potential of Pokémon. It is an imperfect prototype.

items.Name: Dropped Item
items.Description: The Xtransceiver found at the Nimbasa City amusement park. It seems it belongs to a boy/girl.

items.Name: Dropped Item
items.Description: A looking glass that reveals the truth. It's a mysterious glass that returns a Pokémon to its original shape.

items.Name: Reveal Glass
items.Description: A looking glass that reveals the truth. It's a mysterious glass that returns a Pokémon to its original shape.

items.Name: Weakness Policy
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Attack and Sp. Atk sharply increase if the holder is hit with a move it's weak to.

items.Name: Assault Vest
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.

items.Name: Holo Caster
items.Description: A device that allows users to receive and view hologram clips at any time. It is also used to chat with others.

items.Name: Prof's Letter
items.Description: A letter that Professor Sycamore wrote to your mother. A faint but pleasant perfume seems to cling to the paper.

items.Name: Roller Skates
items.Description: Attaches roller skates to the bottom of your shoes, allowing you to glide quickly around and perform tricks.

items.Name: Pixie Plate
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fairy-type moves.

items.Name: Ability Capsule
items.Description: A capsule that allows a Pokémon with two Abilities to switch between these Abilities when it is used.

items.Name: Whipped Dream
items.Description: A soft and sweet treat made of fluffy, puffy, whipped and whirled cream. It's loved by a certain Pokémon.

items.Name: Sachet
items.Description: A sachet filled with fragrant perfumes that are just slightly too overwhelming. Yet it's loved by a certain Pokémon.

items.Name: Luminous Moss
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def if hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.

items.Name: Snowball
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Attack if hit with an Ice-type attack. It can only be used once.

items.Name: Safety Goggles
items.Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These goggles protect the holder from both weather-related damage and powder.

items.Name: Roseli Berry
items.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one super effective Fairy-type attack.

items.Name: Kee Berry
items.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder's Defense if it's hit with a physical move.

items.Name: Maranga Berry
items.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder's Sp. Def if it's hit with a special move.

items.Name: Sprinklotad
items.Description: A watering can shaped like a Lotad. It helps promote the healthy growth of any Berries planted in good, soft soil.

items.Name: TM96
items.Description: Teaches Nature Power to a compatible Pokémon. This attack makes use of nature's power. Its effects vary depending on the user's environment.

items.Name: TM97
items.Description: Teaches Dark Pulse to a compatible Pokémon. The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

items.Name: TM98
items.Description: Teaches Power-Up Punch to a compatible Pokémon. Striking opponents over and over makes the user's fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

items.Name: TM99
items.Description: Teaches Dazzling Gleam to a compatible Pokémon. The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

items.Name: TM100
items.Description: Teaches Confide to a compatible Pokémon. The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

items.Name: Power Plant Pass
items.Description: This pass serves as an ID card for gaining access to the power plant that lies along Route 13.

items.Name: Mega Ring
items.Description: This ring contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying Mega Stones to Mega Evolve in battle.

items.Name: Intriguing Stone
items.Description: A rather curious stone that might appear valuable to some. It's all in the eye of the beholder.

items.Name: Common Stone
items.Description: A perfectly normal stone that might appear valuable to some. It's all in the eye of the beholder.

items.Name: Discount Coupon
items.Description: This special coupon allows you to buy items at a discount when you are shopping at a boutique.

items.Name: Elevator Key
items.Description: A card key that activates the elevator in Lysandre Labs. It is emblazoned with Team Flare's logo.

items.Name: TMV Pass
items.Description: A commuter pass that allows the holder to ride the TMV between Lumiose City and Kiloude City at any time.

items.Name: Honor of Kalos
items.Description: A precious symbol that is awarded only to an individual who has done great things for the Kalos region.

items.Name: Adventure Rules
items.Description: This book contains all the points a new Trainer needs to know on a journey. It was handmade by a kind friend.

items.Name: Strange Souvenir
items.Description: An ornament depicting a Pokémon that is venerated as a protector in some region far from Kalos.

items.Name: Lens Case
items.Description: A rather chic-looking case for carrying contact lenses.

items.Name: Makeup Bag
items.Description: A light and yet incredibly efficient trunk, which can contain every last piece of clothing that can be bought.

items.Name: Travel Trunk
items.Description: A light and yet incredibly efficient trunk, which can contain every last piece of clothing that can be bought.

items.Name: Lumiose Galette
items.Description: A popular treat in Lumiose City. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.

items.Name: Shalour Sable
items.Description: Shalour City's famous shortbread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.

items.Name: Jaw Fossil
items.Description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks as if it could be a piece of a large jaw.

items.Name: Sail Fossil
items.Description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on land. It looks like the impression from a skin sail.

items.Name: Looker Ticket
items.Description: A ticket that was handmade by Looker. It's decorated with a liberal amount of glittery paint.

items.Name: Bike
items.Description: A folding Bike that enables a rider to get around much faster.

items.Name: Holo Caster
items.Description: A device that allows users to receive and view hologram clips at any time. It is also used to chat with others.

items.Name: Fairy Gem
items.Description: A gem with an essence of the fey. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fairy-type move one time.

items.Name: Mega Charm
items.Description: A stone filled with an unexplained power. It makes Pokémon that battle with a Mega Stone Mega Evolve.

items.Name: Mega Glove
items.Description: This cuff contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.

items.Name: Mach Bike
items.Description: This folding Bike more than doubles your movement speed.

items.Name: Acro Bike
items.Description: This folding Bike allows you to perform actions such as wheelies and bunny hops.

items.Name: Wailmer Pail
items.Description: This is a tool for watering Berries you planted to make them grow more quickly.

items.Name: Devon Parts
items.Description: A case that contains mechanical parts of some sort made by the Devon Corporation.

items.Name: Soot Sack
items.Description: A sack used to gather and hold volcanic ash.

items.Name: Basement Key
items.Description: The key to New Mauville, which was constructed beneath Mauville City.

items.Name: Pokéblock Kit
items.Description: A set containing a Berry Blender for making Pokéblocks and a Pokéblock Case for storing Pokéblocks.

items.Name: Letter
items.Description: An extremely important letter to Steven from the President of Devon Corporation.

items.Name: Eon Ticket
items.Description: The ticket required for sailing on a ferry to the Southern Island. Does Norman, the Petalburg Gym Leader, know a secret?!

items.Name: Scanner
items.Description: A device found inside Sea Mauville.

items.Name: Go-Goggles
items.Description: Nifty goggles to protect eyes from desert sandstorms.

items.Name: Meteorite
items.Description: A Meteorite originally found at Meteor Falls. You got it at Mt. Chimney.

items.Name: Key to Room 1

items.Name: S.S. Ticket
items.Description: The ticket required for sailing on a ferry.

items.Name: HM07
items.Description: Teaches Dive to a compatible Pokémon. Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn. It can be used to dive deep in the ocean.

items.Name: Devon Scuba Gear
